TEXT.S: Paridrayan i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Paridrayan. u kasalumaluma' nu Paridrayan sa, 229 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 733 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 718 ku tademaw, pakalatu 98%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 15 ku tademaw, pakalatu 2%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 95%, Rukai 1%, Bunun 1%, zumazuma 1%.
